bulletin_message.000: Haha, il n'y a rien de mieux que la vue d'un avant-poste flambant neuf, avec votre travail acharné, cette terre désolée sera bientôt un lieu de richesse et de prospérité ! Nous serons de retour demain avec le magasin entier, mais en attendant, voici la mise de départ fournie par la compagnie :
bulletin_message.001: Que le Singe vous garde, amis! C'est toujours un plaisir de voir un groupe arriver à son point de vente désigné. Conformément à votre contrat, nous serons de retour avec le magasin entier demain. En attendant, voici les fournitures de départ que la Société fournit pour de nouveaux avant-postes :
bulletin_message.002: La Compagnie de Commerce Iskender est toujours à la recherche d'un nouvel endroit pour se reposer entre deux routes. Nous sommes heureux de vous voir ici, amis ! Nous serons de retour avec le magasin demain, mais en attendant, voici un échantillon de nos produits, pour vous aider à démarrer :
bulletin_message.003: Tout est prêt pour commencer un nouvel avant-poste, hein ! Mes amis, le désert accueille tous ses enfants. Nous serons de retour demain pour vérifier, mais en attendant, la compagnie a envoyé ces fournitures pour vous aider à démarrer :
bulletin_message.004: Aha, un nouveau partenaire potentiel pour la Compagnie de Commerce Iskender ! Nous devons revenir demain avec le reste du magasin, mais en attendant : prenez ses semences pour investissement, et voyez ce que vous pouvez en faire pour nous, hein ?

bulletin_message.000: Eh bien, en plus d'être distingué comme un canton officiel, vous gagnerez la reconnaissance de commerçants et les voyageurs de partout dans Hearth. Nous allons également vous proposer des plans d'architecture que nous avons recueillies dans le cadre de nos opérations avec les établissements des autres enfants de Rayya.

L'église de Rayya, plus communément connu sous son mystère, peut désigner un avant-poste comme un point de passage officiel de l'Église. Pour être admissible, votre ville doit fournir un sanctuaire où les voyageurs et vagabonds fatigués peuvent donner des offrandes au singe et rendre hommage à mère guilde de Rayya.

shrine_reqs.choice_001: Comment puis-je gagner de la renommée ?

bulletin_message.000: Eh bien, arriver au point, je crois que nous pouvons à la fois bénéficier d'un accord de toutes sortes. Nous, à l'Agence Iskender efforçons de créer les cartes les plus complètes de Hearth, et nous souhaitons des détails des établissements et des avant-postes notables tels que le vôtre. Avec votre permission, bien sûr !

details.choice_000: Qu'est-ce que je reçois en retour ?

bulletin_message.000: Génial ! Mettons ce processus en marche alors. Tout d'abord, comment voulez-vous être connu ? Nous pouvons vous mettre sur la carte comme un lieu réputé pour son : comptoir commercial, lieu saint, ou marchandises exotiques.
Comment voulez-vous être connu ? Nous pouvons vous mettre sur la carte comme un lieu réputé pour son : comptoir commercial, lieu saint, ou marchandises exotiques.

Salutations, amis de [str(i18n_data.town_name)] ! Cela fait un bon moment depuis que nous avons visité la dernière fois cet avant-poste. On dirait que vous avez fait bon usage des fournitures que nous vous avions livrés.

Afin de gagner la renommée du commerce de marchandises exotiques, votre ville doit se livrer à des métiers avec des visiteurs venus de terres lointaines et donc avoir accès à une variété de produits qui seraient autrement impossibles à obtenir dans votre région.
Singe soit avec vous, [str(i18n_data.town_name)] ! Je vais vous laisser un oiseau, afin que vous puissiez me convoquer pour évaluer votre progrès !

Pourquoi, nos cartographes font des préparatifs pour la prochaine itération d'impression de la carte Iskender de la Hearth. Bien que nous à Iskender avons une agence d'échange connus pour le commerce, nous sommes également fiers de l'exactitude et l'utilité de nos cartes. Des colonies et des routes à travers le monde sont représentés dans les moindres détails.

Afin de gagner la renommée en tant que comptoire commercial pour les masses, il est important que votre ville soit un endroit accueillant à l'échange des marchandises entre les commerçants et les voyageurs en visite. Je vais donner à votre potier une recette; afin de construire un monument qui peut agir comme un monument grandiose et accueillant au cœur de votre colonie.

Excellent ! En plus d'un monument approprié, votre ville devra également avoir accumulé un certain niveau de valeur. Je laisserai les exigences avec vous, si vous souhaitez les consulter à nouveau, ou choisir un chemin différent plus aventageux que votre choix initial.

Je vais donner à votre potier une recette d'un sanctuaire sacré, qu'on transmet à la plupart des officiers d'élite. Ils disent que les ingrédients se trouvent dans les anciennes structures et des coffres de butin; construisez le monument et je reviendrai pour vérifier si elle est conforme aux spécifications de l'Église.

Je vais donner à votre potier une recette. Vous pouvez obtenir les ingrédients de marchands ambulants et caravanes commerciales, mais il faut noter que pas beaucoup de voyageurs en transportent sur eux. Construisez un monument qui incorpore ces ingrédients afin de démontrer votre excellence dans le commerce de produits exotiques.

bulletin_message.00: Once the outpost founding forms are filled and back in their satchel, Arke picks it up and starts on her journey back to the closest Iskender Trading Agency office.
A Hearth of Makers, on the other hand, is for those who believe that a town's value is its work, and that its work is best measured in gold.
Cheer, Glory, or Makers - the choice is entirely yours. Think of what matters most to your Settlement, and follow that beacon into the future!

As you know, Hearths have been the cornerstone of Settlements all the way back to the Phoenix Empire.

If not for their glow, Rayya's Children caravans would never find their way in the desert, and our society would have scattered long ago. The type of Hearth also says much about what a Settlement values.
For instance, a Hearth of Cheer is for those who believe that a town's value is found in being a happy home for its citizens.
Finally, a Hearth of Glory is for those who believe that there comes a time when negotiations no longer suffice, and the land has to be protected by force.

Hello, again! This time I'm visiting in a more official capacity than usual, and without my trading goods. We at the Iskender Trading Company are very impressed with your Outpost's progress, and have decided that it's time to officially update your member status to that of 'Settlement'.

Before we can do that, though, it is customary to choose a Hearth to represent your town.
The messenger fox returns, with a reply from Amyyria Iskender.

Conversely, we expect you to start considering the next step in your Outpost's evolution. Although most of our partner outposts opt to focus on trade, we think other approaches to prosperity are equally valuable to Rayya's Children, and it is always up to the Outpost themselves to make that decision.

Monkey keep you!
Amyyria Iskender
Iskender Trading Company


P.S. A small gift for you, for good luck ✨

Congratulations on your Founding!

Your Outpost is now officially in the company ledger, and I trust that you're well on your way to becoming our primary contact in the region!

To help you achieve this worthy goal, we'll be directing more of our trading partners towards your outpost in the days to come, and encouraging those leaving their caravans to head to [str(i18n_data.town_name)].

Of course, with our backing, everyone will know that when you call something a 'Masterwork', you mean it! It's in the bylaws, after all.

I have no doubt that traders will soon be going out of their way to pay your Town a visit. I'd expect lots of company!

Alright, enough with all this business talk - I'm going to find a spry young thing and get to dancing!

What? You're only as old as you act!

(Adia nods, mumbling to herself. 'Hmm... yes, I suppose this will do nicely, nicely indeed.')

Oh! Children, you have chosen well to sign on as part of the Merchant Council's network, and we are certainly glad to have you!

msg1.bulletin_title: Adia Radie leans in, examining the Monument

bulletin_message.00:
Ha! I guess that's true!

So, we scrounged up some weapon designs from dusty old tomes that the Rayya's Mystery folks had stashed away - I brought some copies along to give out to your crafters, so they can try and work out how to put 'em together.

msg2.choice_000: I'm sure they'll figure it out!

bulletin_message.00:
No doubt!

Alright, I've been on my feet all day, so I'm gonna go grab a bowl or a slice of something! Congratulations!

Wow, I bet this can be seen from miles off! Those goblins will be running scared before long!

I'm so glad you decided to sign up with us - there's not too many of us Painted Dogs yet, but we're growing fast because of Towns like you!

Each morning, this blessed Shrine will bestow a little of Her Mystery upon each of you.

Ponder it. Take that curiosity out into the world with you as you trade, or explore, or welcome strangers into your Town hoping to overhear some tantalizing new bit of information.
Of course, we at the Temple will expect a regular report of any goings on. That can wait, though - for now, it's time for all of us to eat, drink, and be merry!

Monkey keep you, sisters and brothers. What a suitable shrine you've built!

I especially enjoy the key hanging from Monkey's tail - what lock is it meant for? What could be hidden behind that lock? Truly, a mystery!

Wonderful, wonderful! Your Town certainly does the Iskender name proud!

Thank you for throwing such a nice reception for me and our guests.

This monument we're celebrating about is special, by the way - a Town's founding imbues a special sort magic into it.

Building more statues and such can serve decorative purposes, but they won't have the same sort of glow, if you know what I mean.

(Yap! Yap!)

Yes, yes, Arke, I know, it's time to go.

I'd love to stay longer, but there's other, less self-sufficient Caravans out there that need my attention.

Congratulations on all your success, and thanks for not having ever made too much paperwork for me.

Hello, [str(i18n_data.town_name)]!

I'm so glad to finally get to see your Settlement with my own eyes! I thought Naryal's accounts of its splendor were exaggerations, but I see now that they may actually have been understatements!

Well, let's move on to business. Here are the potential sponsors I mentioned in my last letter. Please take a moment to hear what they have to say.

Monkey keep you, brothers and sisters! I am Nona Trist, a High Priestess of Her Mystery. Grandmother Rayya has left us a task, to explore the world and find out all its secrets. One way we work towards this is by sponsoring towns here, far from the heart of Rayya's Children territories.

In return for our sponsorship, we typically ask a Settlement to build a Shrine to Her Mystery, to serve as a constant reminder that the world is a mysterious place, rife with opportunities for exploration and learning. Once the shrine is blessed, it will spread its magical effects among your populace, empowering them in strange and mysterious ways.

Dedicating a Shrine of Her Mystery will grant your townsfolk a random daily buff. Try your luck!

Come here, children! I'm Adia Radie, Chair of the Merchant Council, and an admirer of this budding little Settlement of yours. So efficient! So promising! I've visited many a young Settlement in my long years, but I never tire of seeing good, hardworking Children of Rayya settling down and expanding the reach of our trading routes.

Adia produces a handful of hard candy from her robes and distributes them among the group.

As you know, the Merchant Council is the main sponsor of Rayya's Children Towns, so I'm sure you aren't surprised to see me here. We would love to have you join the Council - I think your Settlement can produce and export some of the finest goods Rayya's Children have to offer, and keep the tradition of excellency that we are known for.

Dedicating a Trader Monument will grant the ability to create Masterwork-quality furniture and decorations, which are considerably better than those of Excellent quality.

Hey! I am Emeret Kaver! You probably haven't heard of me yet, but I'm the leader of The Painted Dogs, a group of young people trying to make sure our peaceful ways survive the hardships of the modern world, be it goblin raids or undead infestations, by training Rayya's Children in various self defense techniques. And now we are looking for Settlements to join our numbers!

We think your people have shown that they have the strength needed to protect this Settlement, and even some of your neighbors, so we'd like you to build an Ever-Burning Flame to be a beacon of safety in these lands, and in return we will share some of our latest weapon and armor schematics.

Dedicating the Ever-Burning Flame will grant you recipes for new, highest-tier weapons.

So! Now you've met everyone, and my job as the facilitator is coming to a close. I don't want to influence your choice, but I can assure you they're all very powerful and can help your town achieve its full potential.

I'll leave the plans for each of the shrines and whatnot with your Potters.

It's been a pleasure visiting, and I'm looking forward to seeing you again at the dedication ceremony!

I am currently making arrangements to finally visit your Settlement myself, and when I do, I will be bringing along several individuals who have expressed interest in sponsoring up and coming Settlements like yours. These are highly regarded members of our society, so be sure to have your best teaware ready!

Monkey keep you!
Amyyria Iskender
Iskender Trading Company

Dear [str(i18n_data.town_name)]-ites,

I have received many reports from our trading partners singing your Settlement all kinds of praises. I am so glad that our investment in your Outpost is bearing fruit so quickly!

As you may remember from our contract, the final service we offer any Outpost under our guidance is to connect them to some prominent members of Rayya's Children society, who can help them cross that final bridge to becoming a Town.
Looks like Amyyria is getting in touch with us again!

Once you have made your choice, please record them on the provided forms and send them back with Arke. And please be sure to feed her before she leaves. She prefers berries, but she'll accept prickly pears as well.

Monkey keep you,
Amyyria Iskender,

A determined-looking fennec fox approaches, carrying in its snout a leather satchel with "Iskender Caravan Official Mail" stitched onto it. She drops it by the town standard and settles down, looking up expectantly.

Dear Caravan [str(i18n_data.town_serial_number)],

Thank you for volunteering to establish a new outpost so far to the West! We here at the Iskender Trading Company are delighted that you chose us to facilitate your founding.

Once the paperwork is in order, an official company caravan led by Agent Naryal Iskender will start a new route to your outpost.

To start, in order for us to enter your outpost into the company ledger, you must choose a name, as well as a Standard.

The Standard declares to the rest of Rayya's Children the purpose behind you settling down, though we have found that it is even more effective at inspiring an outpost's own people.
Apparently, in addition to the letter, Arke's satchel contains a smaller satchel full of coins, labeled "Outpost Founding Incentive".

Monkey keep you, friend! Now that our existing contract is resolved, we'd like to remind you that the Iskender Trading Company is always open for repeat business!

In fact, since this collaboration went so well, if you'd like to establish another town, we'd be happy to sponsor a larger caravan that can carry a few of your citizens from here, as well as some extra goods and records. Just let us know when you're ready!

Re-embarking allows you to carry over up to 3 citizens, 10 items, and all your unlocked recipes when starting a new town.
